com.hesamian.ring

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hesamian.ring.Operation

  • public class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles Operation. Operation class and enum Type are tightly coupled. It is good practice to store Operation Types as enums.
    Since:
    08/30/2016
    Author:
    Seyedamirhossein Hesamian

      • existPrintName

        public static int existPrintName(java.lang.String str)
        This method checks if there is printName of one of the Types in given String. If yes, it returns the index of printName. Else, it returns -1.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
